message: I'll be leaving probably around 5pm from Zeeland if anyone wants to carpool. I live right by the highway entrance, and can seat 4 passengers plus all the gear you could ever want to bring.
I should mention that I'm only planning on Friday night (including the after party) due to other commitments on Saturday.
I'll join ya. Don't think I'm going to take the bus this year unless a bunch of people really need it.
Do you have free candy painted on the side of the van?
Ok, leaving Zeeland Park and Ride (parking lot between 7-11 and McDonalds) at about 5pm. Look for me in the white GMC van with the spare tire on the roof.
I might have to just for the night. It is a cargo van after all.
short bus costs me about $50 in gas to bring and I don't have that right now. If folks are willing to throw in a few bucks - i'm cool with bringing it. Otherwise I'm going to take a back seat ride
